attributes.action: Stop MS Treatments / Medication being a Postcode Lottery - Equal Access for all
attributes.additional_details:
More than 100,000 people in the UK have Multiple Sclerosis & sadly there is no cure. 

MS is a condition that affects your brain & spinal cord. In MS, the coating that protects your nerves (myelin) is damaged. This causes a range of symptoms like blurred vision and problems with how we move think and feel. 

Sign the Petition to allow people with Multiple Sclerosis to access the treatment & medication they need & STOP the Postcode Lottery once & for all.

www.facebook.com/groups/MSUK1
attributes.background:
In the UK, there are Treatments/Medications for people with certain types of MS, in hope to help manage their symptoms. Sadly, it all comes down to a Postcode Lottery. Treatments/Medications some Patients access, others cannot. 

This isn't acceptable & MUST be reviewed. STOP the Postcode Lottery!
